definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Cylindrical little light more set off the sentiment that Luo Mandi overcomes.
sentences.chinese: 圓柱形小燈更映襯了羅曼蒂克的情調。
我是個羅曼蒂克的人，經常爲汽車寫詩。

sentences.english: and you want it to be romantic.
sentences.chinese: 你想要那天成爲羅曼蒂克的一天。

sentences.english: While Venus retrogrades , there is always the possibility of a miscommunication or error in judgment regarding romance.
sentences.chinese: 金星的逆行，總會伴隨這對羅曼蒂克錯誤判斷。

sentences.english: It is considered to be one of the most romantic photos to have ever been taken.
sentences.chinese: 這是公認的最羅曼蒂克的照片之一。

sentences.english: Romantic love songs fill the air in that cozy Italian restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 那家溫馨的意大利餐館充滿着羅曼蒂克的情歌。

sentences.english: The item, as retailed, is romantic in the extreme.
sentences.chinese: 據說，這件新聞是非常羅曼蒂克的。

definition: to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
